name: BIOL 230
title: Grant Writing in the Biomedical Sciences
description: Introduction to the fundamentals of grant writing in biomedical research, including best practices for presentation of data and communication of research findings. Participants write and peer-edit most components of the NIH Ruth Kirschstein F31/F32 pre- or post-doctoral fellowship.

pre_req_data.text: Enrollment is restricted to graduate students.
